talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: He was such an good priest but,

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: He was almost executed in the kingdom.

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: He was falsely accused of a traitor.

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: We knew the truth, but we can't save him.

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: But I didn't know he changed like that.

talkDataSet.name: Commander
talkDataSet.dialogue: What a sad thing. But There is nothing we can do.

talkDataSet.name: Wizard
talkDataSet.dialogue: I'll go home first and rest.

talkDataSet.name: Swordman
talkDataSet.dialogue: Okay! You worked hard. Go home and rest!
